member.name: T:PersianDateTimeFormat
member.summary: Specifies the date and time format

member.name: T:PersianDateTimeMode
member.summary: Specifies the persian date and time mode to determining the PersianDateTime.Now.

member.name: F:PersianDateTimeMode.System
member.summary: Using the current time zone.

member.name: F:PersianDateTimeMode.PersianTimeZoneInfo
member.summary: Using the persian time zone.

member.name: F:PersianDateTimeMode.UtcOffset
member.summary: Using the UTC date and time with custom daylight saving time.

member.name: T:PersianDateTime
member.summary: Represents an instant in time, typically expressed as a date and time of day in the persian calendar.

member.name: F:PersianDateTime.Mode
member.summary: Specifies the persian date and time mode to determining the PersianDateTime.Now.

member.name: F:PersianDateTime.PersianTimeZoneInfo
member.summary: A System.TimeZoneInfo object that represents the persian time zone.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.op_Subtraction(PersianDateTime,PersianDateTime)
member.summary: Subtracts a specified date and time from another specified date and time and returns a time interval.
member.param: The date and time value to subtract from (the minuend).
The date and time value to subtract (the subtrahend).
member.returns: The time interval between d1 and d2; that is, d1 minus d2.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.op_GreaterThan(PersianDateTime,PersianDateTime)
member.summary: Determines whether one specified PersianDateTime is greater than another specified PersianDateTime.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns: true if d1 is greater than d2; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.op_GreaterThanOrEqual(PersianDateTime,PersianDateTime)
member.summary: Determines whether one specified PersianDateTime is greater than or equal to another specified PersianDateTime.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns: true if d1 is greater than or equal to d2; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.op_LessThanOrEqual(PersianDateTime,PersianDateTime)
member.summary: Determines whether one specified PersianDateTime is less than or equal to another specified PersianDateTime.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns: true if d1 is less than or equal to d2; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.op_Subtraction(PersianDateTime,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Subtracts a specified time interval from a specified date and time and returns a new date and time.
member.param: The date and time value to subtract from.
The time interval to subtract.
member.returns: An object whose value is the value of d minus the value of t.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.op_Addition(PersianDateTime,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Adds a specified time interval to a specified date and time, yielding a new date and time.
member.param: The date and time value to add.
The time interval to add.
member.returns: An object that is the sum of the values of d and t.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.op_LessThan(PersianDateTime,PersianDateTime)
member.summary: Determines whether one specified PersianDateTime is less than another specified PersianDateTime.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns: true if d1 is less than d2; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.op_Equality(PersianDateTime,PersianDateTime)
member.summary: Determines whether two specified instances of PersianDateTime are equal.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns: true if d1 and d2 represent the same date and time; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.op_Inequality(PersianDateTime,PersianDateTime)
member.summary: Determines whether two specified instances of PersianDateTime are not equal.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns: true if d1 and d2 do not represent the same date and time; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.GetMonthName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the name of the specified month.
member.param: An integer that represents the month, and ranges from 1 through 12.
member.returns: The name of the specified month.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.GetDayName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the name of the specified day.
member.param: An integer that represents the day, and ranges from 0 through 6.
member.returns: The name of the specified day.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.IsLeapYear(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified year is a leap year. The number of days is 366 in a leap year.
member.param: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
member.returns: true if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.GetDaysInYear(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of days in the specified year.
member.param: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
member.returns: The number of days in the specified year. The number of days is 365 in a common year or 366 in a leap year.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.GetDaysInMonth(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of days in the specified month of the specified year.
member.param: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
An integer that represents the month, and ranges from 1 through 12.
member.returns: The number of days in the specified month of the specified year.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a date to its PersianDateTime equivalent.
member.param: A string containing a date to convert.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.Parse(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its PersianDateTime equivalent.
member.param: A string containing a date to convert.
A string containing a time to convert.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.#ctor(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PersianDateTime class to a specified dateTime.
member.param: A date and time in the Gregorian calendar.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PersianDateTime class to the specified persian date.
member.param: The persian date

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int16)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PersianDateTime class to the specified persian date and time.
member.param: The persian date.
The time.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PersianDateTime class to the specified persian date and time.
member.param: The persian date.
The time.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PersianDateTime class to the specified year, month, and day.
member.param: The year (1 through 9999).
The month (1 through 12).
The day (1 through the number of days in month).

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PersianDateTime class to the specified year, month, day, hour, minute, and second.
member.param: The year (1 through 9999).
The month (1 through 12).
The day (1 through the number of days in month).
The hours (0 through 23).
The minutes (0 through 59).
The seconds (0 through 59).

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.IsLeapYear
member.summary: Determines whether the year represented by this instance is a leap year. The number of days is 366 in a leap year.
member.returns: true if the year represented by this instance is a leap year; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.GetWeekOfYear(System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule)
member.summary: Returns the week of the year that includes the date represented by this instance.
member.param: An enumeration value that defines a calendar week.
member.returns: A positive integer that represents the week of the year that includes the date represented by this instance.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.AddSeconds(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a new PersianDateTime that adds the specified number of seconds to the value of this instance.
member.param: A number of whole and fractional seconds. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
member.returns: An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of seconds represented by value.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.AddMinutes(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a new PersianDateTime that adds the specified number of minutes to the value of this instance.
member.param: A number of whole and fractional minutes. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
member.returns: An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of minutes represented by value.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.AddHours(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a new PersianDateTime that adds the specified number of hours to the value of this instance.
member.param: A number of whole and fractional hours. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
member.returns: An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of hours represented by value.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.AddYears(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new PersianDateTime that adds the specified number of years to the value of this instance.
member.param: A number of years. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
member.returns: An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of years represented by value.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.AddMonths(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new PersianDateTime that adds the specified number of months to the value of this instance.
member.param: A number of months. The months parameter can be negative or positive.
member.returns: An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and months.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.AddDays(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a new PersianDateTime that adds the specified number of days to the value of this instance.
member.param: A number of whole and fractional days. The value parameter can be negative or positive.
member.returns: An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the number of days represented by value.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.Add(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Returns a new PersianDateTime that adds the value of the specified System.TimeSpan to the value of this instance.
member.param: A positive or negative time interval.
member.returns: An object whose value is the sum of the date and time represented by this instance and the time interval represented by value.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.ToDateTime
member.summary: Returns a System.DateTime object that is set to the date and time represented by this instance.
member.returns: A System.DateTime object that is set to the date and time represented by this instance

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.ToInt
member.summary: Converts the date represented by this instance to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
member.returns: n 32-bit signed integer equivalent to the date represented by this instance.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.ToString
member.summary: Converts the value of the current PersianDateTime object to its equivalent string representation.
member.returns: A string representation of the value of the current PersianDateTime object.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.ToString(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the value of the current PersianDateTime object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format.
member.param: A custom date and time format string.
member.returns: A string representation of value of the current PersianDateTime object as specified by format.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.ToString(PersianDateTimeFormat)
member.summary: Converts the value of the current PersianDateTime object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format.
member.param: A persian date and time format string.
member.returns: A string representation of value of the current PersianDateTime object as specified by format.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
member.param: An object to compare to this instance.
member.returns: true if value is an instance of PersianDateTime and equals the value of this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PersianDateTime.Equals(PersianDateTime)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether this instance is equal to the specified PersianDateTime instance.
member.param: A PersianDateTime instance to compare to this instance.
member.returns: true if the value parameter equals the value of this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:PersianDateTime.Now
member.summary: Gets a PersianDateTime object that is set to the current date and time in the persian calendar on this computer.
